name: importabular
description: 5kb javascript spreadsheet, let your users import their data from excel.

scripts.build-doc: rm -rf docs && parcel build demo/index.html --out-dir docs --public-url https://renanlecaro.github.io/importabular/
scripts.build-lib: rm -rf dist/* && terser src/index.js --module --compress --mangle --module --keep-classnames --mangle-props regex=/^_/ --ecma 2015 > dist/index.js && gzip -k dist/index.js && ls -l dist
scripts.build: npm run build-doc && npm run build-lib && npm run build-jsdoc

author: Renan LE CARO
